SageMakerImageArn.description: The ARN of the SageMaker image that the image version belongs to.
SageMakerImageArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the SageMaker image that the image version belongs to.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:sagemaker:.+:[0-9]{12}:image/[a-z0-9]([-.]?[a-z0-9])*$  
Update requires: No interruption

SageMakerImageVersionArn.description: The ARN of the image version created on the instance.
SageMakerImageVersionArn.markdownDescription:

Required: No  
Type: String

Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:sagemaker:.+:[0-9]{12}:image-version/[a-z0-9]([-.]?[a-z0-9])*/[0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
